name: Illaoi
title: the Kraken Priestess
lore:
''I'm not big on sermons. Broken bones teach better lessons.''
Illaoi's powerful physique is dwarfed only by her indomitable faith. As the prophet of the Great Kraken, she uses a huge, golden idol to rip her foes' spirits from their bodies and shatter their perception of reality. All who challenge the ''Truth Bearer of Nagakabouros'' soon discover Illaoi never battles alone - the god of the Serpent Isles fights by her side.
blurb:
''I'm not big on sermons. Broken bones teach better lessons.''
Illaoi's powerful physique is dwarfed only by her indomitable faith. As the prophet of the Great Kraken, she uses a huge, golden idol to rip her foes' spirits from their bodies and ...
allytips_0: Tentacles are an immense source of power. Don't fight without them.
allytips_1: Spirits inherit their target's current health. If making a Vessel is your goal, try whittling your opponent's health down a bit first to make killing the Spirit easier.
allytips_2: Leap of Faith is best used to follow-up a strong engage or when being engaged upon. Be careful about being the first one into a fight.
enemytips_0: Killing Tentacles whenever possible will make it much easier to win a fight against Illaoi.
enemytips_1: When your Spirit gets pulled out, fight back if you can. Dealing damage to Illaoi reduces the Spirit's duration.
enemytips_2: Avoid grouping up for Leap of Faith to reduce the number of Tentacles available to Illaoi.

passive_description: Illaoi and theVessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at Spirits, Vessels, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit.
passive_sanitizedDescription: Illaoi and theVessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at Spirits, Vessels, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit.
